tweet: Deposits and Withdrawals enabled for BTC, LTC and DOGE. Hot Wallet is being topped up manually between 9AM-5PM (NZST) Monday-Friday. Withdrawals will not be available outside of these times or on NZ public holidays (Good Friday 19 April, Easter Monday 22 April, ANZAC Day 25 April

LTC Earl Woods was a Veteran & Mil Retiree who did 2 tours in Vietnam (apparently he didn’t have a debilitating bone spur).  I’d like to think he taught his son something about how medals are earned, not handed out like carnival trinkets, and what they represent.  @TigerWoods

LTC G. Paul Moffett served in the United States Army National Guard for 30 years before retiring in 2012. He was awarded the Legion of Merit and Tennessee Distinguished Service Medal and was a Bronze Star recipient.  RIP✝️We will remember you brother.  https://t.co/eQL8OMHQFJ
